thread.title: Clay Travis Drops The Hammer On People Demanding More Diversity
thread.title_full: Clay Travis Drops The Hammer On People Demanding More Diversity

author: David Hookstead
title: Clay Travis Drops The Hammer On People Demanding More Diversity
text:
Clay Travis (Credit: Screenshot/Youtube Fox Sports Live) 5447876 
Fox Sports pundit and Outkick the Coverage founder Clay Travis hit his Twitter followers with some tough truth Friday afternoon. 
The outspoken pundit spoke directly when responding to the claim, “The PLANET needs diversity in journalism,” from a Wall Street Journal reporter. (SLIDESHOW: 12 TIMES SPORTS PUNDIT KRISTINE LEAHY LOOKED ABSOLUTELY STUNNING) 
Travis responded, “False. The PLANET needs diversity in journalistic thought. Not different colors who all think the same.” False. The PLANET needs diversity in journalistic thought. Not different colors who all think the same. https://t.co/K0Zdc69mJH 
— Clay Travis (@ClayTravis) January 27, 2017 
Travis’ outlook is a view rarely spoken in the sports world.
